channel.title: Bad header links
channel.description:
On any page other than the home page, most of the header links are broken.
[b]Media[/b] Should be: [url]https://release.blackmesasource.com/pages/media.html[/url] Is: [url]https://www.blackmesasource.com/media.html[/url]
[b]Team[/b] Should be: [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Team_Members[/url] Is: [url]https://www.blackmesasource.com/team.html[/url]
[b]Information[/b] Should be: [url]https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Black_Mesa:About_the_Mod[/url] Is: [url]https://www.blackmesasource.com/about.html[/url]

item.title: Bad header links
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
That’s because from the home page it opens up an an inner window with ajax rather than going straight to the page. Why they didn’t just use jQuery load I’m not sure.

/talkingnerdy

Read full topic

item.title: Bad header links
item.dc:creator: RYANSUPERGENIUS1123
item.description:
Koibu:

On any page other than the home page, most of the header links are broken.

Media
Should be: https://release.blackmesasource.com/pages/media.html
Is: https://www.blackmesasource.com/media.html

Team
Should be: https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Team_Members
Is: https://www.blackmesasource.com/team.html

Information
Should be: https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Black_Mesa:About_the_Mod
Is: https://www.blackmesasource.com/about.html

Thanks. The new links help. But there’s something wrong with the media page now. When I load that Media page from your new link, all the links on there are broken (404 Not Found).

Read full topic
